description: This file defines a Loader component using LightningJS framework. It creates a visual loading indicator with animated dots, manages its properties such as loaderColor, and implements a pulsing animation.

classes.name: Loader
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing a loading animation with animated dots.

methods.name: _parseColor
methods.description: Parses input to produce a color value, accepting either a number or a hex string.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Initiates the pulsing animation of the loader's dots.
